Field Detail

BOUNCES

static final LongMetric BOUNCES
The total number of single-page visits to your site.

ENTRANCES

static final LongMetric ENTRANCES
The number of entrances to your site. The value will always be equal to the number of visits when aggregated over your entire website. Thus, this metric is most useful when combined with dimensions such as ga:landingPagePath, at which point entrances as a metric indicates the number of times a particular page served as an entrance to your site.

EXITS

static final LongMetric EXITS
The number of exits from your site. As with entrances, it will always be equal to the number of visits when aggregated over your entire website. Use this metric in combination with content dimensions such as ga:exitPagePath in order to determine the number of times a particular page was the last one viewed by visitors.

NEW_VISITS

static final LongMetric NEW_VISITS
The number of visitors whose visit to your site was marked as a first-time visit.

PAGEVIEWS

static final LongMetric PAGEVIEWS
The total number of pageviews for your site when aggregated over the selected dimension. For example, if you select this metric together with ga:pagePath, it will return the number of page views for each URI.

TIME_ON_PAGE

static final SecondsMetric TIME_ON_PAGE
How long a visitor spent on a particular page or set of pages. Calculated by subtracting the initial view time for a particular page from the initial view time for a subsequent page. Thus, this metric does not apply to exit pages for your site. The value from this metric is returned in the XML as a string, with the value represented in total seconds. Different client libraries have various ways of representing this value, such as a double, float, long, or string.

TIME_ON_SITE

static final SecondsMetric TIME_ON_SITE
The total duration of visitor sessions over the selected dimension. For example, suppose you combine this field with a particular ad campaign. In this case, the metric will display the total duration of all visitor sessions for those visitors who came to your site via a particular ad campaign. You could then compare this metric to the duration of all visitors who came to your site through means other than the particular ad campaign. This would then give you a side-by-side comparison and a means to calculate the boost in visit duration provided by a particular campaign. The value from this metric is returned in the XML as a string, with the value represented in total seconds. Different client libraries have various ways of representing this value, such as a double, float, long, or string.

VISITORS

static final LongMetric VISITORS
Total number of visitors to your site for the requested time period. When requesting this metric, you can only combine it with time dimensions such as ga:hour or ga:year.

VISITS

static final LongMetric VISITS
The total number of visits over the selected dimension. A visit consists of a single-user session, which times out automatically after 30 minutes unless the visitor continues activity on your site, or unless you have adjusted the user session in the ga.js tracking for your site. See Adjusting the User Session for more information.

AD_CLICKS

static final LongMetric AD_CLICKS
The total number of times users have clicked on an ad to reach your site.

AD_COST

static final CurrencyMetric AD_COST
Derived cost for the advertising campaign. The currency for this value is based on the currency that you set in your AdWords account.

CPC

static final CurrencyMetric CPC
Cost to advertiser per click.

CPM

static final CurrencyMetric CPM
Cost per thousand impressions.

CTR

static final PercentageMetric CTR
Click-through-rate for your ad. This is equal to the number of clicks divided by the number of impressions for your ad (e.g. how many times users clicked on one of your ads where that ad appeared).

IMPRESSIONS

static final LongMetric IMPRESSIONS
Total number of campaign impressions.

UNIQUE_PAGEVIEWS

static final LongMetric UNIQUE_PAGEVIEWS
The number of different (unique) pages within a visit, summed up across all visits

ITEM_REVENUE

static final CurrencyMetric ITEM_REVENUE
Total revenue from purchased product items on your site. See the tracking API reference for _addItem() for additional information.

ITEM_QUANTITY

static final LongMetric ITEM_QUANTITY
The total number of items purchased. For example, if users purchase 2 frisbees and 5 tennis balls, 7 items have been purchased.

TRANSACTION_REVENUE

static final CurrencyMetric TRANSACTION_REVENUE
The total sale revenue, including shipping and tax, if provided in the transation. See the documentation for _addTrans() in the tracking API reference for additional information.

TRANSACTIONS

static final LongMetric TRANSACTIONS
The total number of transactions.

TRANSACTION_SHIPPING

static final CurrencyMetric TRANSACTION_SHIPPING
The total cost of shipping.

TRANSACTION_TAX

static final CurrencyMetric TRANSACTION_TAX
The total amount of tax.

UNIQUE_PURCHASES

static final LongMetric UNIQUE_PURCHASES
The number of product sets purchased. For example, if users purchase 2 frisbees and 5 tennis balls from your site, 2 product sets have been purchased.

SEARCH_DEPTH

static final LongMetric SEARCH_DEPTH
The average number of subsequent page views made on your site after a use of your internal search feature.

SEARCH_DURATION

static final SecondsMetric SEARCH_DURATION
The visit duration to your site where a use of your internal search feature occurred.

SEARCH_EXITS

static final LongMetric SEARCH_EXITS
The number of exits on your site that occurred following a search result from your internal search feature.

SEARCH_REFINEMENTS

static final LongMetric SEARCH_REFINEMENTS
The number of refinements made on an internal search.

SEARCH_UNIQUES

static final LongMetric SEARCH_UNIQUES
The number of unique visitors to your site who used your internal search feature.

SEARCH_VISITS

static final LongMetric SEARCH_VISITS
The total number of visits to your site where a use of your internal search feature occurred.

GOAL1_COMPLETIONS

static final LongMetric GOAL1_COMPLETIONS
The total number of completions for the specific goal. You can request completions for individual goals by number (e.g. ga:goal1Completions).

GOAL2_COMPLETIONS

static final LongMetric GOAL2_COMPLETIONS
The total number of completions for the specific goal. You can request completions for individual goals by number (e.g. ga:goal1Completions).

GOAL3_COMPLETIONS

static final LongMetric GOAL3_COMPLETIONS
The total number of completions for the specific goal. You can request completions for individual goals by number (e.g. ga:goal1Completions).

GOAL4_COMPLETIONS

static final LongMetric GOAL4_COMPLETIONS
The total number of completions for the specific goal. You can request completions for individual goals by number (e.g. ga:goal1Completions).

GOAL_COMPLETIONS_ALL

static final LongMetric GOAL_COMPLETIONS_ALL
The total number of completions for all goals defined for your profile.

GOAL1_STARTS

static final LongMetric GOAL1_STARTS
The total number of starts for the requested goal number.

GOAL2_STARTS

static final LongMetric GOAL2_STARTS
The total number of starts for the requested goal number.

GOAL3_STARTS

static final LongMetric GOAL3_STARTS
The total number of starts for the requested goal number.

GOAL4_STARTS

static final LongMetric GOAL4_STARTS
The total number of starts for the requested goal number.

GOAL_STARTS_ALL

static final LongMetric GOAL_STARTS_ALL
The total number of starts for all goals defined for your profile.

GOAL1_VALUE

static final CurrencyMetric GOAL1_VALUE
The total numeric value for the requested goal.

GOAL2_VALUE

static final CurrencyMetric GOAL2_VALUE
The total numeric value for the requested goal.

GOAL3_VALUE

static final CurrencyMetric GOAL3_VALUE
The total numeric value for the requested goal.

GOAL4_VALUE

static final CurrencyMetric GOAL4_VALUE
The total numeric value for the requested goal.

GOAL_VALUE_ALL

static final CurrencyMetric GOAL_VALUE_ALL
The total value for all goals defined for your profile.
